mapper.sql: id, customer_name, mobile, email, head_picture, password, sex, validity, register_ip, register_time, update_time, points, last_logintime, update_id, customer_level, address, country, province, city
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from customer
order by ${orderByClause}
